| HistoryText             = '''Death-Flight''' were clones of [[Warren Worthington III (Earth-616)|Warren Worthington III]] created from flesh extracted by [[Clan Akkaba (Earth-616)|Clan Akkaba]] in the [[Akkaba Metropolis|Hidden Akkaba City]] beneath [[Green Ridge]], [[Colorado (State)|Colorado]] as part of [[William Rolfson (Earth-616)|Genocide]]'s plot to ascend to the greatness [[En Sabah Nur (Earth-616)|his late father]] sought;{{r|Uncanny X-Men Vol 4 9}} however, Genocide's plan was thwarted when the clones were merged into [[Warren Worthington III (Clone) (Earth-616)|Archangel]], as Warren finally accepted that being the harbinger of destruction was his cross to bear, while at the same time he swore off violence entirely.{{r|Uncanny X-Men Vol 4 10}}
